mapper.sql: id, groupon_order_id, order_id, member_id, voucher, win_voucher,groupon_result, back_prize, groupon_status ,create_time
mapper.select: SELECT u1.nick_name groupNickName, u1.avatar groupAvatar, ga.activity_title grouponName, u.nick_name nickName, o.pay_time payTime, d.goods_count goodsCount FROM `groupon_order_master` g LEFT JOIN user_member u on u.id = g.member_id LEFT JOIN order_master o on o.id = g.order_id LEFT JOIN order_detail d on d.order_id = g.order_id LEFT JOIN groupon_order go on go.id = g.groupon_order_id LEFT JOIN user_member u1 on u1.id = go.user_member_id LEFT JOIN groupon_activities ga on ga.id = go.groupon_activities_id WHERE g.groupon_order_id = #{grouponOrderId} ORDER BY o.pay_time DESC

SELECT ga.`mode` activityMode, om.id orderId, om.system_order_no orderSn, om.practical_pay totalFee, od.goods_count goodsCount, od.goods_name goodsName, od.goods_spec goodsSpc, od.goods_price goodsPrice, um.weixin_openid openId FROM groupon_order_master gom LEFT JOIN order_master om on om.id = gom.order_id LEFT JOIN order_detail od on od.order_id = om.id LEFT JOIN user_member um on um.id = gom.member_id LEFT JOIN groupon_order go on go.id = gom.groupon_order_id LEFT JOIN groupon_activities ga on ga.id = go.groupon_activities_id WHERE gom.groupon_order_id = #{grouponOrderId} and gom.groupon_status = #{grouponStatus}

SELECT u.avatar avatar, u.nick_name nickName, CASE o.groupon_order_id WHEN 0 THEN '发起拼团' WHEN null THEN '' WHEN -1 THEN '' ELSE '参与拼团' END msgType FROM order_master o LEFT JOIN user_member u ON u.id = o.member_id WHERE o.id = #{orderId};
